main event: Three bright, white, oval-shaped lights were observed hovering and then moving rapidly, disappearing within 10-15 minutes.
interesting points: The lights were initially stationary, then started moving more rapidly before disappearing.
The sighting occurred in Pine Mountain, Georgia.
The report is a Project 10073 Record Card from Project Blue Book, a US Air Force program that investigated UFOs.
The image includes a hand-drawn sketch or diagram of the unidentified aerial phenomenon.
The report references a letter from Cobham College School that did not contain sufficient information for analysis.
